Text: Why is this file so big, when the 1080p PublicHD release is just 7.6 GB???
As I figured, this is a direct rip of the Blue-Ray's files....there's no actual video file in it, just the file structure from the blue-ray itself.  Plz learn to rip.

Thanks for the UP!

Still amazes me that some people on these sites have no idea about high quality HD Rips.

If you have a clue and a quality HD Player it will Play BDMV folder structure rips just fine.
